ISSUE.TITLE: Underscore does not count as a special character in super admin password
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.11.3 Platform: linux OS: Synology DSM 7.0 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create new NocoDB container 2. Create a password that meets all requirements with the special character as `_` 3. Unable to create account

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): Navbar icon and text color issue Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): Password validation & i18n key correction Added `_` in special character list re #386 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
fix(gui): Password validation & i18n key correction Added `_` in special character list re #386 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
